about_the_game:
FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator is realistic game about modern drone warfare. We want to make it as close to reality as possible, and we need the help of the community.

Current features:
  • Anti-tank kamikaze drones
  • Top-down grenade drop drones
  • Night vision
  • Infrared camera
  • Day and night missions
  • Several training and combat maps
  • Different types of enemy vehicles (artillery, infantry fighting vehicles, tanks)
  • Enemy infantrymen

Upcoming features in the next updates:
  • More drone varieties with different parameters
  • Even more realistic flying experience
  • Weather changing system on maps
  • More advanced artificial intelligence of enemy infantry and vehicles
  • More interesting missions
  • Vehicle destruction system
  • Building destruction system
  • Ammunition Explosion System
  • Other features suggested by players during Early Access

Since a lot of people ask where the developer is from: I am from Kyrgyz Republic. The game is neutral, I do NOT support ANY of the sides of the current military conflicts (Russia-Ukraine, Israel-Palestine, etc.)

FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator is realistic game about modern drone warfare. We want to make it as close to reality as possible, and we need the help of the community.

Current features:

name: FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator is an advanced and realistic early access game with kamikaze drones, grenade dropping, night vision and thermal imaging missions.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
